import React from "react"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import CheckOutSteps from "../components/CheckOutSteps"; const PlaceOrderScreen = () => { const { address } = useSelector((state) => state.shipping); const { paymentMethod } = useSelector((state) => state.payment); const { cartItems } = useSelector((state) => state.addToCart); const roundPrice = (num) => Number(num.toFixed(2)); //this line rounds up the numbers to 2 decemal places. "5.123" => 5.12 const totalItemsPrice = roundPrice( cartItems.reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.qty * item.price, 0) ); const shippingPrice = totalItemsPrice > 100 ? roundPrice(0) : roundPrice(20); const taxPrice = roundPrice(0.15 * totalItemsPrice); const totalPrice = totalItemsPrice + shippingPrice + taxPrice; return (

  • Shipping

    Name: {address.fullName}
    Address: {address.address}, {address.city}, {address.state},{" "} {address.postalCode}, {address.country}

  • Payment

    Method: {paymentMethod}

  • Order Items

      {cartItems.map((item) => { return (
    • {item.name}
      {item.qty} x ${item.price} = $ {item.price * item.qty}
      • ); })}

  • Order Summary

  • Items
    ${totalItemsPrice}
  • Shipping
    ${shippingPrice}
  • Tax
    ${taxPrice}
  • Order Total
    ${totalPrice}
); }; export default PlaceOrderScreen;
